entities.name: procession
entities.description: A group of people walking in a formal or ceremonial manner, described as forming and moving through the garden towards the marquee.

entities.name: garden
entities.description: The location where the procession is taking place, described as having exotic flowers and bewitched birds.

entities.name: marquee
entities.description: A large tent or canopy, described as being at the end of the garden that the procession is moving towards.

entities.name: exotic flowers
entities.description: Flowers that are unusual or rare, described as fluttering on the witches' hats.

entities.name: bewitched birds
entities.description: Birds that have been magically enchanted, described as fluttering on the witches' hats.

entities.name: witches'
entities.description: A group of middle-aged women who are part of the procession and wearing hats with exotic flowers and bewitched birds.

entities.name: veela cousins
entities.description: A group of female wizards' relatives, described as needing help understanding English customs.

entities.name: George
entities.description: One of the main characters, who is helping to deal with the veela cousins and middle-aged witches.

entities.name: Fred
entities.description: One of the main characters, who is helping to escort French girls into the tent.

entities.name: French girls
entities.description: A pair of young women from France, described as giggling and allowing Fred to escort them inside.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of the main characters, who is taking charge of dealing with the veela cousins.

relationships.description: George is helping to deal with the veela cousins and their understanding of English customs.
Fred is escorting the French girls into the tent.
Ron is taking charge of dealing with the veela cousins.
George is helping to deal with the middle-aged witches.
